thread.title: Grant HS runner's family sues school district

title: Grant HS runner's family sues school district
text: Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Grant HS runner's family sues school district The family of a Grant High School cross country runner is suing the school district for the runner's suspension due to an alcohol-related violation. Post to Facebook Grant HS runner's family sues school district The family of a Grant High School cross country runner is suing the school district for the runner's suspension due to an alcohol-related violation.  //on.kgw.com/1LNEjfg   Grant HS runner's family sues school district The family of a Grant High School cross country runner is suing the school district for the runner's suspension due to an alcohol-related violation.
